name: Premature Material (Skill Card)
text:
Bonz / Skill
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
Once per Duel, lose 800 LP and reveal 1 Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck, then Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your GY whose name is mentioned on that Fusion Monster as material, but its ATK/DEF become 0.
